    Hobbies

    Firefighter

    After serving for four years as young firefighter, I joined the fire and rescue center of Marcigny (Saône et Loire, Burgundy, France) in 2004 as a volunteer firefighter and stopped in 2014. I continue to practice first aid as a first aid worker.

    • [2018] Rescuer first-aid worker certificate
    • [2017] Fire safety & extinguishers certificate
    • [2008] Promotion to the rank of first-class firefighter
    • [2007] Second-class firefighter training validation
    • [2005]
      • Training certificate in first aid on road
      • Training certificate for team-based first aid practices
      • Training certificate for thermal incidents level 1
      • Training certificate for the use of self-contained breathing apparatus
    • [2004] Young firefighter training validation
    • [2003] Training certificate in first-aid

    Algorithmic and programming

    I regularly participate in algorithmic competitions:

    • Participation in the contests “Meilleur développeur de France 2018, 2019 (Finalist)”
    • 1st irish team of the “ACM ICPC United Kingdom and Ireland Programming Contest 2013”
    • Finalist of the “Gosucoder National Coding Challenge 2013” organized by the company Guidewire

    Sports

    I do trails and a bit of road running for fun but also in competitions. Here are some nice races in French-County or nearby:

    • Le semi-marathon du lion de Belfort
    • Wings for Life
    • La ronde du Salbert
    • Trail du pont Sarrazin
    • Trail des bornes

    Music/Reading/Video Games/…

    I started to play the guitar in high-school and bass guitar recently in a small cover band.

    I am always up for a game of Age of Empires 2, Team Fortress 2, Rocket League, Battlefront 2 and many others…

    Join me on Steam ;-)

    Some great books I love and recommend (for SF and heroic fantasy lovers):

    • The Black Company/La Compagnie Noire by Glen Cook
    • Remembrance of Earth’s Past/Le Problème à Trois Corps by Liu Cixin
    • The Witcher/Le Sorceleur by Andrzej Sapkowski
    • The Dark Tower/La Tour Sombre by Stephen King
    • Foundation/Fondation by Isaac Asimov
    • Thrawn Trilogy/La Croisade Noire du Jedi Fou by Thimothy Zhan
    • La Horde du Contrevent by Alain Damasio
    • The Belgariad/La Belgariade by David Eddings

    Developpez.com

    I am an active member of the community Developpez.com since 2007. Since April 2012, I am redactor and moderator for the Semantic Web section.

    • Involved in the translation of a tutorial about D2RQ engine.
    • Several contributions to the Q/A of the section.
